https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iDPnmWZwP2x1Xpit2i9RUNYJaVh.jpg Taxi driver David, who's doomed after a terminal cancer diagnosis, accidentally kills hotel owner Patrick in a car crash. Patrick's girlfriend takes over his hotel by a lake in Hong Kong, which is soon plagued by serial suicidal incidents. Always Be with You
